name: help anime
value: gives an example on how to use it

name: help manga
value: gives an example on how to use it

name: help character
value: gives an example on how to use it

name: help person
value: gives an example on how to use it

name: search
value: [BASIC] gives a list of results when given an {type}["anime", "manga", "person", "character"] {title}[STRING]

name: help search
value: gives an example on how to use it

search:
[BASIC] m! search anime Naruto | This would result in a list of anime that matches the search of "Naruto"
[BASIC] m! search character Subaru | This would result in a list of characters that matches the search of "Subaru"
anime: m! anime 1 | This would result in the anime with an ID of 1
manga: m! manga 1 | This would result in the manga with an ID of 1
character: m! character 1 | This would result in the character with an ID of 1
person: m! person 1 | This would result in the person with an ID of 1
